name: preccx  higher order compiler compiler
short_description: PRECCX is an infinite-lookahead higher-order compiler-compiler for context-dependent grammars. The generated code is ANSI C and ANSI C++; the code will compile and run under either C or C++. PRECCX grammars admit EBNF + inherited and synthetic attributes
